On Thu, 2002-08-15 at 10:53, Erik Williamson wrote:
> > 
> > That's not the same problem. Making a RPM from given binaries is simple.
> > 
> 
> Sweet - do you know where can I find out more info on this?  

Officially no. But also on my ftp://people.redhat.com/ckloiber page is
rpms for the rar-3.00 file archiving/unarchiving program. This is
distributed as a binary tarball only, and I repackaged it based
originally on an earlier version of rar I found on the net, just for
practice. It also makes use of subpackages, and I was both proud of
myself for getting it to work, and sickened that I repackaged
binary-only crap. Enjoy.

-- 
Chris Kloiber
